properties.author: Raluca Gordân, Lee Narlikar, Uwe Ohler and Alexander J. Hartemink
properties.contact: Alexander J. Hartemink (amink@cs.duke.edu) and Raluca Gordân (raluca@cs.duke.edu)
properties.citation: Narlikar, L., Gordân, R., Ohler, U., and Hartemink, A. (2006) "Informative priors based on transcription factor structural class improve de novo motif discovery" Intelligent Systems in Molecular Biology 2006 (ISMB06) Bioinformatics 22:e384-392
properties.description:
PRIORITY is a software package for de novo motif discovery. Its goal is to incorporate informative position-based priors into a collapsed Gibbs sampling algorithm.

MOTIFLAB NOTE: The stand-alone version of PRIORITY includes some additional functionality which have been hidden in the bundled version for compatibility reasons, for instance the possiblity of using different positional priors for each motif when searching for multiple motifs. In MotifLab the same priors track will be used for each motif searched, which increases the chance of reporting duplicate motifs.
